The image was shared on Facebook on May: 2020, along with a Tagalog-language caption mentioning the portrait of Japan's prime minister Shinzo Abe next to President Duterte in Tokyo's Shibuya district.
The official website for the Japanese pr: not Shinzo Uzumaki Jotaro Abe, as mentioned in the claim.
The same photo was shared multiple times: indicating a possible attempt to spread misinformation.
A reverse image and keyword search on Go: and the original photo was taken in Jakarta, Indonesia, showing portraits of Duterte and Indonesian President Joko Widodo.
